trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ligonier
There were no other sightings in Ligonier on or around September 12th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsSpotted orange light hovering in sky, went into house grabbed lazer went back out and shined lazer at it since there where no blinking aircraft lights on it. It disappeared.
Summary: orange object hovering SW of ligonier, flashed lazer at it and it disappeared
